title: re-start
author: re-start
content: Hello. I am new here. I am desperately looking for work I have a lot of CV.My English level is high.I have been active in the world of cryptocurrencies for about 4 years and I know everything very well.I am a member of many casinos.I can help you as an online support, writer, Telegram group manager or anything else.Familiar with:TrelloGoogle sheetsAll customer service programs such as "Live chat, Intercom, Proofhub"Instagram, Telegram, Twitter, Reddit, FacebookI can work for you with the lowest price.For example, $50 per week to work as an online supporter team. (8 hours a day)Please let me know if you need me. Thanks all!

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Good luck on your search mate. I think your thread could be more professional if your topic title contains some of your services offered and not only 'looking for work'.I see other users here including their skills and services in the title for better reach.

comments.author: re-start
comments.body: Quote from: un_rank on July 17, 2022, 06:08:57 PMGood luck on your search mate. I think your thread could be more professional if your topic title contains some of your services offered and not only 'looking for work'.I see other users here including their skills and services in the title for better reach.Thank you for your suggestion. I've updated it!

comments.author: Raihan050
comments.body: QuoteI have been active in the world of cryptocurrencies for about 4 years and I know everything very well.Well, it's look like you have enough knowledge & experience about cryptocurrency. Then why you are not starting cyrpto trading? you can make a good amount from trading.

(8 hours a day)Please let me know if you need me. Thanks all!Did you manage to find any work through the forum I would suggest you to make a fiverr profile and display your work there - you will surly get some work from there,
